name: Wayout (itch) (Turtle Games)
description:
Hey guys, this is my first game please give a try it is awsm. This is a puzzle type game which is absolutely nice and mind relaxing game.

It can be run in also low end pc 

minimum requirements-:

windows - 7,8,10,11 and vista

processor - low dual core 

ram - 500mb

no graphic card needed 

Enjoy the Game guys-:)
